product_name: Rollerblade Protective Gear Jr 3-Pack - Toddlers' - Special Buy
long_description: The Rollerblade Protective Gear Jr 3-pack outfits your little one with the protective gear they need to keep elbows, wrists and knees covered. 3-pack includes wrist guards, knee pads and elbow pads. Polyethylene plastic stands up to hard surfaces; polyurethane padding adds cushioning; nylon and synthetic mesh is soft against skin. Pads secure with rip-and-stick closures. Special buy.
short_description: The Rollerblade Protective Gear Jr 3-pack outfits your little one with the protective gear they need to keep elbows, wrists and knees covered.
